Body:
if bbox_roi != (0, 0, 0, 0):
    x, y, w, h = bbox_roi
    if flag_tracker_active:
        title = 'Helico'
        color = COLOR['RED']
    else:
        title = 'Motion'
        color = COLOR['BLUE']
    cv2.rectangle(frame, (x, y), (x + w, y + h), color, 2)
    cv2.putText(frame, title, (x, y - 10), cv2.FONT_HERSHEY_SIMPLEX, 0.5,
        color, 2)
else:
    pass
tracker_state = 'ON' if flag_tracker_active else 'OFF'
text_count = 'Frame number: {}'.format(frame_count)
text_tracker = 'Tracker: {}'.format(tracker_state)
cv2.putText(frame, text_count, (10, 20), cv2.FONT_HERSHEY_SIMPLEX, 0.5,
    COLOR['WHITE'], 2)
cv2.putText(frame, text_tracker, (10, 40), cv2.FONT_HERSHEY_SIMPLEX, 0.5,
    COLOR['WHITE'], 2)
cv2.imshow(VIDEO_STREAM_PATH, frame)
key = cv2.waitKey(1) & 255
flag_quit_program = True if key == ord('q') else False
return flag_quit_program
